page.title: 09Converted Martello Tower
page.content:
One Martello Tower has been converted into a house. At one time all the floors were knocked out and replaced, which you can see, because instead of the normal 3 floors there are 4. The basement has 4 rooms, the ground floor has 4 rooms also, and the first floor only has 3 rooms. Where the cannon should be they have put in a sun deck and a sunroom. In the sunroom on the floor is a mosaic of the coast line and where the Tower stands.
Before 1960 there was an attempt to convert the Tower, but they failed and in about 1960 a popular architect bought the Tower and converted it into a comfy home. This Tower had a ditch around it instead of a movable ladder which you can tell because of the very low garden. It is being sold at the moment for seventy thousand pounds.
